item.title: 特朗普计划提高生物燃料配额，寻求抑制外国供应
item.description: 特朗普政府建议炼油厂明年在汽油和柴油中掺入更多生物燃料，同时设法阻止使用进口供应。【原文：The Trump administration is proposing oil refiners blend more biofuels into gasoline and diesel next year while seeking to discourage the use of imported supplies.】

item.title: 首席财务官称，OpenAI 将在 Meta 交易后继续与 Scale 合作
item.description: OpenAI 表示，在 Meta Platforms 公司斥资数十亿美元收购 Scale AI 之后，该公司将继续与 Scale AI 合作，以维持一个广泛的数据源生态系统。【原文：OpenAI said it will continue working with Scale AI after Meta Platforms Inc. made a multibillion-dollar investment in the startup, as it seeks to maintain a broad ecosystem of data sources.】

item.title: 受关税影响，加拿大 4 月份工厂和批发销售额下降
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策给加拿大的贸易驱动型行业带来了更明显的活动回落迹象。【原文：Canada’s trade-driven sectors are showing clearer signs of a pullback in activity brought on by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 荷兰选择斯莱鹏接替科特出任央行行长
item.description: 荷兰政府任命 Olaf Sleijpen 担任央行行长。【原文：The Dutch government appointed Olaf Sleijpen to head the central bank.】

item.title: 以色列-伊朗空袭导致领空关闭，航空公司股价下滑
item.description: 以色列对伊朗发动空袭，迫使中东多个国家对商业航班关闭领空，周五全球航空股下跌。【原文：Airline stocks declined around the world on Friday after Israel launched airstrikes across Iran, forcing several countries in the Middle East to close their airspace to commercial flights.】

item.title: 伊朗境内的空袭使石油公司的目光聚焦霍尔木兹海峡
item.description:
价格何去何从将取决于德黑兰如何应对以色列的军事行动。【原文：

Where prices go from here will depend on how Tehran responds to Israel’s military action.

】

item.title: 快船队如何打造 NBA 最佳主场优势
item.description:
奖励最大声的粉丝，并确保有很多很多的卫生间。【原文：

Reward the loudest fans and make sure there are lots and lots of bathrooms.

】

item.title: 特朗普撕毁自由贸易剧本的代价是 1 万亿美元
item.description:
美国总统关税改革的不祥轨迹笼罩着七国集团会议。【原文：

The ominous trajectory of the US president’s tariff overhaul looms over the G-7 gathering.

】

item.title: 中国通过汽车数据出口规则推动特斯拉自动驾驶计划
item.description: 中国政府发布了关于向海外传输汽车数据的指导方针草案，此举可能为特斯拉公司最先进的驾驶辅助功能在全球最大的汽车市场更广泛地推广铺平道路。【原文：Chinese authorities released draft guidelines on transmitting data from automobiles overseas, a move that could pave the way for the wider rollout of Tesla Inc.’s most advanced driver-assistance functions in the world’s largest car market.】

item.title: 日本加藤称与市场谈判是发行债券的关键
item.description: 日本财务大臣表示，与市场参与者的讨论是确保政府债券买卖稳定的关键因素，因为该大臣即将与投资者举行一次备受关注的聚会。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister said that discussions with market participants is a key factor in making sure that government bonds are bought and sold stably, as the ministry neared a closely watched gathering with investors.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 G42 公司开设欧洲中心，彰显日益增长的人工智能雄心
item.description: 阿布扎比的主要人工智能公司 G42 正在成立一个欧洲分部，作为阿布扎比酋长国进军欧洲大陆的更广泛举措的一部分，阿布扎比政府已承诺向欧洲大陆投资数十亿美元。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main artificial intelligence company, G42, is launching a European unit as part of the emirate’s broader push into the continent, where the government has pledged billions of dollars in investment.】

item.title: 印度与中国高官会晤解决稀土限制问题
item.description: 印度官员在本周与中国外交部副部长的会谈中讨论了中国对稀土的限制，熟悉此事的人士说，汽车制造商继续警告说，稀土短缺迫在眉睫，可能会扰乱这个南亚国家的产量。【原文：Indian officials discussed China’s rare earth restrictions during talks with that country’s vice foreign minister this week, people familiar with the matter said, as automakers continue to warn of a looming shortage that may disrupt output in the South Asian nation.】

item.title: Meta 在追求规模化人工智能的过程中面临监管审查的风险
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，杰姬-达瓦洛斯（Jackie Davalos）将报道大科技公司在人工智能领域的 "收购-雇佣 "战略，该战略正引起监管机构的严格审查。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Jackie Davalos reports on Big Tech’s “acqui-hire” strategy for artificial intelligence that is drawing scrutiny from regulators.】

item.title: 大科技公司正在给扁平化设计致命一击
item.description:
从 Airbnb 的新应用图标到苹果公司的 "液态玻璃 "设计，拟物化设计又回来了，数字世界中的一切都重新拥有了立体感。【原文：

From Airbnb’s new app icons to Apple’s “Liquid Glass” design, skeuomorphism is back and everything in the digital world has dimensionality again.

】

item.title: 美国企业利润增长为吸收关税提供缓冲
item.description: 我是华盛顿的经济编辑本-霍兰。今天我们将探讨美国企业利润率对通货膨胀的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Ben Holland, an economics editor in Washington. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: "破坏王 "特朗普让七国集团变得更有必要
item.description:
即将在加拿大举行的会议可能是难得的求同存异的场所，尽管论坛本身正显得日益过时。【原文：

The upcoming conclave in Canada may be the rare space to find common ground, even as the forum itself is looking increasingly outmoded.

】

item.title: 极端保守派的崛起使智利股市反弹面临考验
item.description: 随着一名极端保守派候选人在民调中的支持率上升，押注今年智利总统选举将向右摇摆的投资者可能会得到比他们预期更多的东西。【原文：Investors betting on a swing to the right in Chile’s presidential election this year may get more than they bargained for as an ultra conservative candidate rises in the polls.】

item.title: 简街签订香港中环数十年来最大租约
item.description: 简街集团（Jane Street Group）已签约承租恒基兆业地产有限公司（Henderson Land Development Co.【原文：Jane Street Group has signed for six floors in an upcoming tower developed by Henderson Land Development Co. in Hong Kong’s central business district, marking the biggest office deal in the area in decades.】

item.title: 伊朗袭击加剧交易商的地缘政治风险
item.description:
更广泛的中东战争威胁令市场震荡。【原文：

The threat of a broader Middle East war has jolted markets.  

】

item.title: 以色列下令暂时关闭最大天然气田
item.description: 以色列能源部表示，以色列下令暂时关闭其最大的天然气田。【原文：Israel ordered its biggest natural gas field to be temporarily shut down, the country’s energy ministry said.】

item.title: 大洋电机总裁称最早将于八月决定退市事宜
item.description: 大洋控股公司将在本月的股东大会后就几家私募股权基金提出的退市建议作出决定，该公司总裁很可能在股东大会上面临下台的投票。【原文：Taiyo Holdings Co. will decide on proposals from several private equity funds to delist it after a shareholder meeting this month, where its president is likely to face a vote on his ouster.】

item.title: 印度航空致命空难使雄心勃勃的扭亏计划面临风险
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）雄心勃勃地计划将自己从一家陈旧的、陷入财务困境的航空公司转变为一家盈利的世界级航空公司，但在十多年来最致命的航空事故之后，这一计划面临着最大的考验。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s ambitious plans to transform itself from a stale, financially troubled carrier into a profitable world-class airline face their biggest test yet after the deadliest aviation accident in more than a decade.】

item.title: 特朗普希望达成协议，伊朗离核武器还有多远？
item.description: 几十年来，伊朗一直因其核野心以及是否正在发展发射原子武器的能力而备受怀疑。【原文：Iran has faced suspicion for decades over its nuclear ambitions and whether it’s developing the capability to fire an atomic weapon.】

item.title: 英国家庭通胀预期在 4 月 CPI 飙升前下降
item.description: 根据英格兰银行在上月消费者价格突然飙升之前进行的一项调查，英国家庭一直预计未来一年的通胀将放缓。【原文：UK households had been expecting inflation to slow over the coming year, according to a Bank of England survey that was conducted before the sudden jump in consumer prices reported last month.】

item.title: 国际米兰将偿还与赞助和媒体版权相关的债券
item.description: 国际米兰足球俱乐部（FC Internazionale Milano SpA）将向以该足球俱乐部的赞助权和媒体权为支持的高收益债券的持有者提前还款。【原文：FC Internazionale Milano SpA is set to give an early payback to holders of its high yield bonds backed by the football club’s sponsorship and media rights.】

item.title: 中国与土耳其续签价值近 50 亿美元的货币互换协议
item.description: 土耳其和中国续签了一项货币互换协议，允许两国央行在未来三年内兑换多达 1,890 亿里拉（48 亿美元）或 350 亿元人民币。【原文：Turkey and China have renewed a currency swap agreement, allowing their central banks to exchange as much as 189 billion liras ($4.8 billion) or 35 billion yuan over the next three years.】

item.title: 首次公开募股前市场 Hiive 寻求新现金，竞争日趋白热化
item.description: Hiive Markets Ltd.是一家风险投资公司股票的在线交易平台，该公司首席执行官表示，希望尽快在今年筹集到多达 1 亿美元的资金。【原文：Hiive Markets Ltd., an online trading platform for shares of venture-backed companies, is hoping to raise as much as $100 million as soon as this year, its chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 随着资产激增至 2,200 亿美元，PSP 在加拿大寻求更多交易
item.description: 加拿大公共部门养老金投资委员会（Public Sector Pension Investment Board）经过多年的全球扩张，已将其投资组合推高至 3,000 亿加元（合 2,200 亿美元），目前正寻求在本国部署更多资金。【原文：Canada’s Public Sector Pension Investment Board is looking to deploy more capital in its home country after years of global expansion that has pushed its investment portfolio to C$300 billion ($220 billion).】

item.title: 经济学家称，美联储至少要到 9 月才会明朗化
item.description: 据彭博新闻社调查的经济学家称，美联储还需要几个月的时间才能清楚地了解特朗普政府的政策变化将如何影响美国经济，因此官员们不太可能在9月之前考虑改变利率。【原文：It will take months yet before the Federal Reserve can get a clear idea of how Trump administration policy changes will shape the US economy, making officials unlikely to consider a change to interest rates before September, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 期权预示新兴市场股票的优异表现可能会消失
item.description: 对于美国交易者来说，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战搅动美国 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）之际，发展中国家股票一直是令人惊喜的回报来源。但是，如果期权能提供任何指引，这种超额收益可能很快就会成为过去。【原文：For US traders, developing-country stocks have been a surprising source of returns as Donald Trump’s trade war roiled the S&P 500 Index. But if options are any guide, that outperformance may soon be a thing of the past.】
